dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3199183V] Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2007 9:35 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3199183V] Trademark Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Trademark Infringement Added by system at Friday, Feb 23 2007 03:34 am X-MailFrom: kehoec@icmcvi.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Feb 23 03:34:47 2007 Received: (qmail 31688 invoked by alias); 23 Feb 2007 09:34:47 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 31680 invoked from network); 23 Feb 2007 09:34:43 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 23 Feb 2007 09:34:43 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 23 Feb 2007 03:34:42 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 23 Feb 2007 03:34:42 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from kehoec@icmcvi.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HKWp8-0002yp-0g for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 23 Feb 2007 03:34:42 -0600 Received: from smtpout10-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net ([64.202.165.238]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from kehoec@icmcvi.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HKWot-000JEU-Bn for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 23 Feb 2007 03:34:27 -0600 Received: (qmail 7824 invoked from network); 23 Feb 2007 09:34:25 -0000 Received: from unknown (87.245.101.81) by smtpout10-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net (64.202.165.238) with ESMTP; 23 Feb 2007 09:34:17 -0000 From: "Charlene Kehoe" To: Cc: , "'Karin Biffiger'" , "'Shawn Stephenson'" Subject: Trademark Infringement Date: Fri, 23 Feb 2007 05:34:15 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_002F_01C7570C.438237E0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 x-mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 Thread-Index: AcdXLcjCurpqA39mSUaZQl6qqRRpxw== Message-ID: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 Feb 2007 09:34:42.0721 (UTC) FILETIME=[D8E26910:01C7572D] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/related) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) February 23, 2007 VIA CERTIFIED MAIL RETURN RECIEPT REQUESTED Re: Trademark Infringement Mr. David Schneider Brain Warehouse LLC 9950 Summers Ridge, Suite 160 San Diego, CA 92121 Phone: +1.8585877100 Fax: + 1.8587775377 Dear Mr. Schneider; International Capital & Management Company, LLLP ("ICMC") owns and licenses to Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Inc. ("CTCA") certain service marks, including the service mark on the term "Cancer Treatment Centers of America". That mark can be found under Registration Number 2273680 in the United States Patent and Trademark Office. Results of a recent internet search shows that your website, www.pdqlending.com , contains references to the words Cancer Treatment Centers of America- a screen print of which is attached hereto. Your improper use of our intellectual property in connection with your website unlawfully implies the existence of a relationship between your business and that of our licensee, and trades upon the goodwill that ICMC and CTCA have developed in the mark. It is clearly designed to cause confusion. As you must be aware, your business has not entered into any type of contractual relationship with CTCA and has never secured permission from ICMC or from CTCA to use CTCA's name or the subject mark. As such, your unauthorized use thereof constitutes trademark infringement. We demand that your business immediately stop these activities and take whatever steps are necessary to remove all references to CTCA or the mark. Please contact me no later than March 20, 2007 to confirm that you have taken these steps. We are fully prepared to do whatever is necessary to protect our interests, but I hope that formal legal action will not be necessary. Sincerely, Cornel Williams Cornel Williams Chief Financial Officer By Charlene Kehoe Director of Intellectual Property Enforcement Charlene Kehoe Development and Marketing Analyst International Capital & Management Company 9015 Havensight Mall, Warehouse K, Ste 3 St. Thomas, VI 00802 340-715-5806 340-777-1303 fx MIME element (text/html)

VIA CERTIFIED MAIL RETURN RECIEPT REQUESTED

 < /o:p>

 < /o:p>

Re: Trademark Infringement

 

Mr. David Schneider
Brain Warehouse
LLC
9950 Summers Ridge,
Suite
160
San Diego, CA 92121
Phone:
      +1.8585877100 

Fax:     
;       +
1.8587775377

 

Dear Mr. Schneider;

 

International Capital & Management Company, LLLP (“ICMC”) owns and licenses to Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Inc. (“CTCA”) certain service marks, including the service mark on the term “Cancer Treatment Centers of America”.  That mark can be found under Registration Number 2273680 in the United States Patent and Trademark Office.

 

Results of a recent internet search shows that your website, www.pdqlending.com , contains references to the words Cancer Treatment Centers of America- a screen print of which is attached hereto.

 

Your improper use of our intellectual property in connection with your website unlawfully implies the existence of a relationship between your business and that of our licensee, and trades upon the goodwill that ICMC and CTCA have developed in the mark.  It is clearly designed to cause confusion.  As you must be aware, your business has not entered into any type of contractual relationship with CTCA and has never secured permission from ICMC or from CTCA to use CTCA’s name or the subject mark.  As such, your unauthorized use thereof constitutes trademark infringement.

 

We demand that your business immediately stop these activities and take whatever steps are necessary to remove all references to CTCA or the mark.  Please contact me no later than March 20, 2007 to confirm that you have taken these steps.  We are fully prepared to do whatever is necessary to protect our interests, but I hope that formal legal action will not be necessary.

 

Sincerely,

 

Cornel Williams

Cornel Williams

Chief Financial Officer

 

By Charlene Kehoe

Director of Intellectual Property Enforcement 

 

 

Charlene Kehoe

Development and Marketing Analyst

International Capital & Management Company

9015 Havensight Mall, Warehouse K, Ste 3

St. Thomas, VI 00802

340-715-5806

340-777-1303 fx
